abstract: The acquisition of the company, which designs security products for mobile devices such as fingerprint sensors, could help Apple bolster the security of its products,
snippet: The acquisition of the company, which designs security products for mobile devices such as fingerprint sensors, could help Apple bolster the security of its products,
lead_paragraph: Apple has found one way to shrink its huge pile of cash.

headline.main: Apple to Acquire AuthenTec for $356 Million
